overview:
Prior to joining Hunt Ventures, Dan Klein was a principal at Vesbridge Partners where he sourced new investments, managed due diligence on deals, and structured complex transactions. Before Vesbridge, Dan was a senior analyst at the Yankee Group, where he served as the leading authority on next generation voice architectures. He authored numerous articles and publications and managed the creation of Yankee’s global forecasts on the communications equipment market.

Klein has close to a decade of experience within the telecommunications market, having worked at both leading equipment vendors including Sycamore Networks, and financial institutions such as Bear Stearns.
